title: New Splash Arts
body: Some of the replacement / new splash arts that have been showing up lately are... well... *WAY* worse than the old ones that they replaced.  Now this has happened quite a lot in the past too, but it's especially noticeable this time with a couple of the new ones looking grainy or low resolution, rather than just artistically distasteful.  Crimson Akali comes to mind, with her new art's face looking a bit pixelated on the loading screen, and Vindicator Vayne is a bit blurry, in addition to having a different facial shape from normal-Vayne and not being recognizable as the same character anymore if not for the armament.  Just thought it warranted attention, as far as presenting very sub-par artwork goes, especially when the art that both examples replaced was already rather good.

replies.body: That's probably because the only "new" splash arts released recently have been the evelyn base, tristana splashes, nid splashes and trundle touch ups.  The rest is just old splash arts from different regions because they are trying to reorganize and unify each regions splash arts.

I think some of the replacements have been way better (look at general wukong, damn i started using that skin again purely for the splash) and others not so good (crimson akali) but they should just be place holders as every patch they are updating 5 or 6 splashes (like the nid ones coming out next patch).
irelia original looks like shit too
